cast.name: DOMM SIMPSON
cast.bio:
Training: Arts Educational School, graduating in 2016.

Theatre includes: professional theatrical debut as Standby Elder Price in The Book of Mormon on Broadway (Eugene O’Neill Theatre).

cast.name: DOMM SIMPSON
cast.bio:
Training: Arts Educational School, graduating in 2016.

cast.name: J. MICHAEL FINLEY
cast.bio:
Theatre includes: Broadway: Elder Cunningham Standby in The Book of Mormon, and Brujon, Champmathieu, Loud Hailer and understudy Valjean in Les Misérables 25th Anniversary. Chicago: Lyric Opera, Drury Lane, Marriott, Paramount, Court, Writers’, Mercury. 

Film includes: Bart Millard in I Can Only Imagine (released in March). 

Thanks to my amazing family and friends! Love to Elizabeth. For my mother, Mary Elizabeth Finley, and my brother, SPC James Matthew Finley. Without them, I would not be here. J Michael Finley is thrilled to be making his West End debut in The Book of Mormon.
